description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7r9hs","text":"This protocol describes an optogenetic activation of neuromelanine-laden dopaminergic neurons in the SNc-VTA. We induce neuromelanin (NM) in the SNc-VTA through viral expression of a humane tyrosinase virus. Furhtermore we express a red-absorbing opsin in one hemispherend and blue absorbing in the other hemisphere. We detail how we optognetic stimulateanimals in over four weeks.\n\nTHis optogenetic deep brain stimulation induces a reduction in neuromelanine levels in dopaminergic neurons, and rescues behavioral phenotypes as evaluate in the grip strength test.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: Optogenetics, optical deep brain stimulation, Neuromelanin
manuscript_citation: {"blocks":[{"key":"1s5un","text":"Optical deep brain stimulation can reactivate NM-laden neurons and rescue behavioral phenotypes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dngki","text":"Stereotactic injection of viruses into DAT-Cre (JAX# 006660) animals","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ajjm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67tun","text":"Viral Constructs:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ngvb","text":"1.- pAAV-hSyn1-dlox-ChrimsonR_tdTomato(rev)-dlox-WPRE ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2e8js","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"sgmc","text":"2.- pAAV-hSyn1-dlox-hCHR2(H134R)_mcherry(rev)-dlox-WPRE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rn6u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5n460","text":"3.- pAAV_Ef1a_DIO_hTyrHA_minBack","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"267ce","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rilb","text":"Injections: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ap10","text":"- Bilateral injections were performed. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86aer","text":"- Right hemisphere: viruses 1 and 3. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kupa","text":"- Left hemisphere: viruses 2 and 3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bqlcd","text":"- Viruses were combined 50:50 and injected a total Volume of 600ul per hemisphere","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cc18j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aitm9","text":"Steroetactic coordinates:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7ies","text":"Subtantia nigra","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9unl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kpr6","text":"ML: 1.4mm AP: 3.25mm DV: 4.0 (blunt needle / NF34BL-2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1k3a1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ko9t","text":"Injection set-up:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40i77","text":"Hamiliton syringe couple t oa WPI injector (UMP3T-1) (link) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":4}],"data":{}},{"key":"fdf94","text":"Injection speed 100nl/min","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"228C64905E3845CAA6A0846519646F8E","url":"https://www.wpi-europe.com/products/pumps-and-microinjection/micro-syringe-pump--stereotaxic-injection/ump3t-1.aspx"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4apl4","text":"- Animals were left to accumulate neuromelanin for 6 or 10 weeks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hmro","text":"- Animals were stimulated for 30 minutes for 4 weeks. Stimulation during 5 days and two days rest.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2f4go","text":"- The stimulation was 635nm, 5ms pulse, 10 Hz at at 10mW. 3 seconds ON 10 seconds OFF.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"buv6p","text":"fibers are attached bilaterally to the animals","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74bqj","text":"the animal is placed in open field arena","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvn2a","text":"stimulation is controlled via PulsePal (OpenEphys link) on a MRL_III-635L laser ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":4}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6ACA7B51E87F4BF8B34C834A34319D8E","url":"https://open-ephys.org/pulsepal"}}}}

title: Optogenetic modulation of dopaminergic neurons
